title: Assassins
body: Assassins are broken please stop buffing them i don't care if the champion has 1% win rate they do to much damage and need to be nerfed

replies.body: I'll just say this: Riot please listen to challengers and not plebs. Thanks.
A champion cannot be broken as well as having a low winrate. You need to learn to play against them - hard CC will shut down most assassins, as well as building the correct items.
not all wins are weighted equally
If someone loses 99% of their games they are not OP no matter how it's weighted

zed with just a few items can almost 100-0 someone without even using ult...

thats fun to play against
